data.message: I not only live in flint (in the scary ghetto part because I cant barely afford rent anywhere except) and ive donated three backpacks full of supplies to local schools. This is an honest struggle for some kids, and where I live, I get to see this everyday in person. Every bit that goes to these kids helps, and they cannot succeed without the appropriate tools. Please help out with the cause, even pennies lead to better things!

replies.message: What part of Flint isn't ghetto besides Miller Rd?
Pickwick, burtucky....pretty much the far south end around township
